alert.note: Alert for Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:11PM CDT until May 18 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HUTCHINSON...SOUTHERN HANSFORD...SOUTHERN SHERMAN AND NORTHERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Cactus, or 13 miles south of Stratford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Cactus, Sunray, Gruver, Morse and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
